long_description: The Pelican 1070 iPad(R) Protect case offers legendary Pelican strength and quality. It's watertight and crush- and dustproof, providing unsurpassed protection for iPad or netbook. Compartment measures 11.11 x 7.92 x 1.63 in. Plush, padded lining protects contents from scratches, bumps and jolts. O-ring seal provides a reliable barrier against dust and moisture; anodized aluminum latch snaps securely shut. The Pelican 1070 iPad Protect case features an automatic pressure purge valve balances pressure for flying and other changes in elevation.
short_description: The Pelican 1070 iPad(R) Protect case offers legendary Pelican strength and quality. It's watertight and crush- and dustproof, providing unsurpassed protection for iPad or netbook.
